adrFormatAddress: 625 8th Ave, New York, NY 10018-1415, USA

originalText.text: So on top of their Monopoly, the company decides that they're going to cancel their last 2 buses going into NYC due to inclement weather....when the snowstorm isnt supposed to start until after midnight!!! Again Monopoly is a felony.

text.text: So on top of their Monopoly, the company decides that they're going to cancel their last 2 buses going into NYC due to inclement weather....when the snowstorm isnt supposed to start until after midnight!!! Again Monopoly is a felony.

originalText.text: Highway robbery. I take the bus regularly to commute. Difficult to purchase tickets online. a they refuses to make website update to make it operational. Not to mention the rate hikes smh. The management staff is awful, rude and disrespectful. I spend thousands of dollars with them, and they are not accommodating… front desk staff and the drivers are friendly. That’s the most I can say about them having good quality service.

originalText.text: Love Martz. Clean coaches and great staff. Service is always on time. And they have great gmrouts and destinations too, so I always travel Martz.

text.text: Love Martz. Clean coaches and great staff. Service is always on time. And they have great gmrouts and destinations too, so I always travel Martz.

originalText.text:
AVOID THEM IF YOU CAN!

I took a train from Stroudsburg, PA to the Port Authority on December 28th and the ride was extremely unpleasant. The bus came late, which I was okay with considering it was the week of Christmas still. What I wasn't okay with was that the bus was overbooked and we had to STAND, which is incredibly dangerous on a two hour drive occurring almost exclusively on the highway. The driver said we could sit, but that was also very uncomfortable and for what I paid for the ticket I honestly expect better treatment. A couple of the standing passengers were middle aged or elderly people, and the fact that we all paid $41 to be treated in this manner is atrocious and a poor reflection of this company. Something needs to be done, whether it means new management, more buses, or cheaper fares. I have photos as proof, but Google won't upload them with this post for some reason.

originalText.text: Expensive with poor customer service and wifi that rarely works. Your only option though, so the company clearly doesn't care. However, it's still hard to understand how such a long-running company doesn't want to take pride in what they offer and feel a sense of service to community. Bums me out.
